Package eg

Class Projects

java.lang.Object
eg.Projects
public class Projects
extends java.lang.Object
The assigned projects.

Projets are represented by objects of ProjectCommands.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Projects​(MainWin mw, FileTree fileTree, EditableDocument[] edtDoc)  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void assign​(ProjectTypes projType)
    Assigns a new project that the file of the selected EditableDocument belongs to; may ask to replace the project
    void build()
    Creates a build of the active project
    void change()
    Changes to the project that the selected EditableDocument belongs to
    void openSettingsWindow()
    Opens the window of the SettingsWindow of the project that the selected EditableDocument belongs to
    void retrieve()
    Tries to retrieve a saved project that contains the directory of the selected EditableDocument
    void run()
    Runs the active project
    void saveAllAndCompile()
    Saves all open files of the active project and compiles the project
    void saveAndCompile()
    Saves the selected file of the active project and compiles the project
    void setDocumentAt​(int i)
    Selects the element in this array of EditableDocument
    void updateFileTree()
    Updates the file tree
    void updateFileTree​(java.lang.String file)
    Updates the file tree if file is contained in the currently shown directory
    void updateProjectControls()
    Enables or disables buttons and menu items depending on whether the selected EditableDocument bolongs to the active, a listed or no project

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
